summary: Comprehensive UX audit completed for Jira Productivity Intelligence SaaS application. Critical OAuth callback issue RESOLVED - no longer shows JSON, properly redirects to Atlassian OAuth. Landing page demonstrates professional appearance with clear messaging. All navigation flows, responsive design, and user journey elements working correctly. Application ready for production use.
passed_tests: Landing Page Professional Appearance - Clear branding, hero messaging, and value proposition
Connect Button Visibility & Functionality - Prominently displayed with proper data-testid
OAuth Flow Fixed - Redirects to Atlassian login (NOT JSON) - CRITICAL ISSUE RESOLVED
Features Grid Display - All 4 key features: Velocity Tracking, Team Comparison, Accountability, Auto-Insights
How It Works Section - Clear 3-step process: Connect, Auto-Sync, Investigate
Professional Design Elements - Gradient backgrounds, proper spacing, container layouts
Footer Messaging - Professional security and feature messaging
Responsive Design - Works correctly on desktop (1920x1080), tablet (768x1024), and mobile (390x844)
Connect Button Mobile Visibility - Remains accessible across all screen sizes
No Console Errors - Clean page load without JavaScript errors
Smooth User Journey - Logical flow from landing to OAuth to dashboard
Loading States - Proper handling of page transitions
Error Handling - No error messages displayed during normal operation
Professional Polish - Enterprise-grade appearance suitable for SaaS product
